Text:
Thank you DownTYU, was waiting for this one.
I love the older movies; if possible please more like this. The newer movies get much cover here but these older ones many tens to forget. Your downloads are a great mix. 
If possible please do Sands of the Kalahari; the long riders or the Comabcheros. Great movies in my opinion and not available on Bluray where I live .  Thanks for all your great oploads.
They are appreciated.
